name: Monster Run (Data 1)
description:
MONSTER RUN -

Might take a minute to load before first play through.

Take a trek through the depths of the Monster Underworld through the the Deep Mines and beyond.  

Grab as many coins as you can while you rack up the highest score!

  • Stunning 3D Poly art.
  • New Mission each run.
  • Can you get the best score out there!?

Have fun, and let me know what you think! :)
